Overland_Park.Menorah Medical Center:
Menorah Medical Center is an acute care hospital located in Overland Park, Kansas at 5721 West 119th Street. It is part of the HCA Midwest Division.


== Hospital Background ==
Menorah Hospital is a 158-bed hospital that first opened its doors in 1931 at 1000 East 50th Street across from UMKC in Kansas City, Missouri.
